Some carriers have been diagnosed with thyroid disease, a condition which is relatively common in the general population. It is unclear whether thyroid disease is related to SLC16A2 gene mutations in these cases.",GHR,Allan-Herndon-Dudley syndrome
What are the treatments for Allan-Herndon-Dudley syndrome ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of Allan-Herndon-Dudley syndrome:  - Gene Review: Gene
